meanings: (가난·구속 등에서) free (sb from sth), break away (from), rid oneself of
(요점·주제 등을) be off the point, be beside the point

vlive.korean: [아직도 동글동글의 충격에서 벗어나지 못한 임나봉] 실제로 보면 제 얼굴이 동그래요? [NAYEON still in shock due to roundness] Is my face round when you see me in person? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “34th Golden Disc Awards DAY 1”
vlive.english: [NAYEON still in shock due to roundness] Is my face round when you see me in person?

vlive.korean: 그런 거 하고 너 지금 머리 여기서 크게 벗어나지 않을 거 아니야? Do that and your hair right now... It won't be too different from this, right? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [휘인] 'soar' Making Prologue #2
vlive.english: Do that and your hair right now... It won't be too different from this, right?

vlive.korean: [물론 다음 주에도 벗어나지 못하는 무인도의 늪!!] 바로... [The trap of Deserted Island that they cannot escape from even next week] Right into... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.93
vlive.english: [The trap of Deserted Island that they cannot escape from even next week] Right into...

examples.korean: He never deviated from his original plan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 원래 계획에서 결코 벗어나지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He’s looking for a job and he’s willing to do anything within reason. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 일자리를 찾고 있는데 사리에 벗어나지 않는 일이면 무엇이든 기꺼이 하려고 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s looking for a job and he’s willing to do anything within reason. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our problems are man-made, therefore they may be solved by man. And man can be as big as he wants. No problem of human destiny is beyond human beings. (John F. Kennedy) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 문제는 인간이 만든 문제이므로, 인간에 의해서 해결될 수 있습니다. 그리고 인간은 원하는 만큼 꿈을 펼칠 수 있습니다. 인간이 벗어나지 못할 운명의 굴레는 없습니다. (존 F. 케네디, 희망명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Our problems are man-made, therefore they may be solved by man. And man can be as big as he wants. No problem of human destiny is beyond human beings. (John F. Kennedy) Add to Wordbook
